Há 120 anos nascia um Mito, o kra que disse que carro de corrida pode andar na rua. Um kra de gênio forte e determinado, que não permitia ninguém falar mal de seu time e mandava embora quem fosse ( lembram do Prost?)...rs E o melhor, de sua mesa era capaz de saber quem era o piloto que estava na pista de testes, só pelo modo de reduzir e acelerar - por isto é um mito. Descanse em Paz. Seus frutos continuam sendo maravilhosos.
Awful Way to Celebrate Enzo’s Anniversary, When The Ferrari Team in Formula 1 Can’t Win a Race against a School Bus 🚌

HAPPY BIRTHDAY MASTER ENZO :) Enzo Ferrari was a genius. The cars that he made and built they weren't  just super cars they were his babies and he worked on them and designed them like they are his most precious ones. Yeah that's how you create something that it will shake and rattle the world with precision engineering. And also I'm so agree with him DREAMING IS SUCHA IMPORTANT THING. It opens the doors of reality :) HAPPY BIRTHDAY AGAIN OUR GENIUS MASTER ENZO FERRARI.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY ENZO FERRARI 🎉🎂🎊 🙌🙌🙌  👑
You have helped so many boys live out their dreams by pushing them to become Men to someday buy your four wheeled art . 
You ! 
Your History ! 
And THAT NAME ! 
Has been in my life since I was 7 years old ! 
I saw my first 246 Dino and I wanted it so badly ! 
Then came " Manimal " that 400i 😍
Then came Miami Vice ! .... WOW ! That Daytona , then the Testarossa 😍
Then the 308 GTS ... Magnum P.I 😍 
And then as a 15 year old boy , I went into Hollywood Sports on Hollywood Blvd years ago ( now I'm 52 ) and I saw this 84/85 288GTO 😍😍😍 , I remember saying to one of the salesmen that would always see me come by : " It looks like a Red Great White Shark ! Or a 308 on Steroids ! " the salesmen just laughed with me . 
You have been the Father to all boys that wanted to own your beautiful Italian machines , that all other car companies try to copy and emulate. 
You ! 
Your team from Niki Lauda to Michael Schumacher to Luca di Montezemolo to all the others in your time and to my young wide opened wild eyes ! 
You have been in my life and kept me " Focused on the Prize ! " Not the Journey ! 
I wish you and your soul a peaceful slumber , because you did it all right ! 
I wish you could see your LaFerrari and the others ! 
Your team has done you proud ! 
Happy Birthday Enzo Ferrari 🎉🎂🎊👍
Capo di Tutti Capi ! 
Always ! 👑
Inspiration, beauty, history and pedigree that will never be surpassed  because of one man and his dream, thankYOU for inspiring me to achieve my dream buon compliant maestro Enzo ❤️
Happy birthday Enzo . Such a passion. Such art. Such beauty . You have inspired many . Loved by all. Thank you . Such grace and  pristine elegance . #enzoferrariday

If were just not loved because of his design.. a good performing engine/transmission, would help to became an "icon". Sadly, mondial 8 were slower than many trucks of that era 😂😂. Then ferrari put this lethargic engine, in lancia too 😂😂. Very poor performance, a golf 2 1.6td with little 2minutes work at pump, would destroy mondial 8.. at least for 1/4 mile dragrace 😂
Too bad that I can’t put pictures to make haters to change their minds..

My black 1984 QV has 240 BHP and turns heads now, the mechanics are very similar to the 308 QV, you can seat the whole family and it is still relatively cheap. The lines have aged very well, but Red was not its color, dark blu, black and silver are better options.
Maybe the worst back engine Ferrari ever.
The best model for me, because i can't afford a good one.

A fantastic underrated car. Owned and driven for over 5 years. Heart racing stuff for me every time I opened the door to that gorgeous smelling crema leather and sat behind that slightly large steering wheel and ever so offset pedal arrangement. 
Sweet car and stomach butterflies entrancing car. 
I miss my QV.
